column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My friends all said eat here
column2: so I did.  We made reservations for 5:30 and we were seated promptly.  Good thing we got there at that time
column3: because by 6 it was pretty packed.  We all started out with the Malnati Salad
column4: which is AMAZING!  If you go here
column5: definitely get that salad.  The dressing was just right
column7: a little sweet and the bacon bits gave it a little more crunch.
